class  HCIs
 Decorates another HCMatcher, retaining the behavior but allowing tests to be slightly more expressive. More...

Define Documentation

#define is   HC_is

Shorthand for HC_is, available if HC_SHORTHAND is defined.

Function Documentation

id<HCMatcher> HC_is ( id  item  ) 

Decorates an item, providing shortcuts to the frequently used is(equalTo(x)).

For example: 

assertThat(cheese, is(equalTo(smelly)))

vs. 

assertThat(cheese, is(smelly))

References HCIs::is:.
